ch.hearc.orlac.preferences.transition

Class PreferencesTransitionJSliderJSpinner_A

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hearc.orlac.preferences.transition.PreferencesTransitionJSliderJSpinner_A
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PreferencesTransitionCryptedToDecrypted, PreferencesTransitionUserInactiv

    public abstract class PreferencesTransitionJSliderJSpinner_A
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class used to save and restore Preferences of JPanelSlider and JPanelSpinner.

    chavailm
